content: Chi sono io? Da dove vengo? C'è vita dopo la morte? Qual è il significato della vita sulla terra?
translations: eng:Who am I﹖ Where do I come from﹖ Is there life after death﹖ What is the meaning of life on earth﹖
eng:Who am I﹖ Where do I come from﹖ Is there life after death﹖ What is the meaning of life﹖
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by Guybrush88 (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
